title: Lighting Basics for Video tutsplus
description:
It can be tricky to get the lighting just right when videoing people. But now, David Bode will show us how to get the lighting perfect for any shot, in studio and out. WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll help you master the art of light rigs, so wherever you find yourself shooting someone, you can make them look great and produce a professional-looking video.

Join us for the fun and excitement of learning this tricky skill!
